snippet.title: Super Mario Land 2 Reclaimed + Wario's Conquest V.3.0 Announcement (Fangame)
snippet.description:
I figured that I should probably release proper trailers for my Super Mario Land 2 remake on here. I'm no expert at game making, but got a lot of experience with this. Version 3 will include 30+ bug fixes, QoL improvements, the first two zones for Wario's Conquest mode, some new extras in the main game and other surprises!
It releases this winter. To be honest, I'm not satisfied with the current public build available, but it's there if you want to try. Otherwise, just follow my Gamejolt account or follow the game at the SAGE website!

https://gamejolt.com/games/SML2WCremake/895658

https://sonicfangameshq.com/forums/showcase/super-mario-land-2-warios-conquest-sage-24-demo.2190/
